entry.RedBlue: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.
entry.Yellow: According to an enduring legend, 9 noble saints were united and reincarnated as this POKéMON.
entry.Gold: Some legends claim that each of its nine tails has its own unique type of special mystical power.
entry.Silver: Its nine beautiful tails are filled with a wondrous energy that could keep it alive for 1,000 years.
entry.Crystal: It is said to live a thousand years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.
entry.Ruby: NINETALES casts a sinister light from its bright red eyes to gain total control over its foe’s mind. This POKéMON is said to live for a thousand years.
entry.Sapphire: Legend has it that NINETALES came into being when nine wizards possessing sacred powers merged into one. This POKéMON is highly intelligent - it can understand human speech.
entry.FireRed: It has nine long tails and fur that gleams gold. It is said to live for 1,000 years.
entry.LeafGreen: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.
entry.Emerald: It has long been said that each of the nine tails embody an enchanted power. A long-lived NINETALES will have fur that shines like gold.
entry.DiamondPearlPlatinum: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.
entry.HeartGold: Some legends claim that each of its nine tails has its own unique type of special mystical power.
entry.SoulSilver: Its nine beautiful tails are filled with a wondrous energy that could keep it alive for 1,000 years.
entry.BlackWhite: Its nine tails are said to be imbued with a mystic power. It can live for a thousand years.
entry.Black 2White 2: Each of its nine tails is imbued with supernatural power, and it can live for a thousand years.
entry.X: It has nine long tails and fur that gleams gold. It is said to live for 1,000 years.
entry.Y: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.
entry.Omega Ruby: Ninetales casts a sinister light from its bright red eyes to gain total control over its foe’s mind. This Pokémon is said to live for a thousand years.
entry.Alpha Sapphire: Legend has it that Ninetales came into being when nine wizards possessing sacred powers merged into one. This Pokémon is highly intelligent—it can understand human speech.
entry.Sun: Legend has it that this mystical Pokémon was formed when nine saints coalesced into one.
entry.Moon: Said to live for a thousand years, this Pokémon uses its supernatural abilities to manipulate fire. It can burn its prey to a crisp as it pleases.
